dc_title_s: Bird's eye view of Charleston, South Carolina, and its environs, showing the scene of General Gilmore's [sic] operations.
dc_description_s: Pages 515-6 of the August 15, 1863 issue of Harper's Weekly. Text on verso. 1 view: col.; 23 x 35 cm. This map is in the public domain. Please attribute access and use of this digitized map to the Stephen S. Clark Library, University of Michigan Library.
